short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly view information about HTTP status codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HTTP Codes gives you information about standard HTTP status codes. All the codes are set out in a grid, with color coordination, making it easy to find the code you are looking for. Clicking on each code will bring up more information... useful if you are developing REST API's and websites that utilize a lot of HTTP status codes.
